caption.p: EECP inhibited MDA-MB-231 cell migration in a glycolysis-dependent manner. (a) Effect of EECP on the migration of MDA-MB-231 cells stimulated with LPS with or without 2-deoxy-D-glucose (2-DG). (b) Quantification of the relative migration rate of MDA-MB-231 cells. Values represent the mean ± SEM from three independent experiments ( ∗ P < 0.05, ∗∗ P < 0.01 vs. control, n = 3).
